description: General Hi is one of Azula's generals and controls an important fortress located at the border of the Fire Nation. She has command over a raiding force. She will never tire to disrupt an enemy's economy and will do everything to keep her fortress from falling into the enemy's clutches. Just like her Princess, she will enjoy slowly burning everything her enemies treasure to the ground.
anger_1: I'm not resting 'til there's nothing left to burn.
nervous_1: Can't put me out that easily.
nervous_2: It's not that easy to snuff me out!
victory_1: This fire will never go out!
victory_2: Scorched earth is my only policy.
victory_4: One little spark and before you know it, the whole world is burning.
thanks: With this I'll start a fire they'll never put out!
extra: Some say the world will end in fire ... sounds alright to me.
siege: Fire makes a fine servant, but a harsh Mistress.
